entry.content: Quantitative MethodsLinear regression $Y_i=b_0+b_1X_i+\epsilon_i, i=1,‚Ä¶,n$Ôºå ÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÊØçÊòØerror term‚Äî‚Äîthe portion of the dependent variable that cannot be explained by the independent variable„ÄÇ$b_0$Âíå$b_1$ÊòØregression coefficients„ÄÇ ‰∏ÄËà¨‰ΩøÁî®Regression analysisÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰∏§Á±ªÊï∞ÊçÆÔºöcross-sectionalÂíåtime series„ÄÇ cross-sectional dataÔºömany observations on X and Y for the same time periodÔºõfrom different companies, asset classes, funds, people, etc time-series dataÔºöuse many observations from different time periods for the same company, funds, country or other entity.
